question:
Last month you had an overseas holiday with some friends where you stayed at their house. They have just sent you some holiday photos. Write a letter to your friends. In your letter:
● Thank them for the holiday and the photos.
● Explain why you didn’t write earlier.
● Invite them to come and stay with you.
text: Hope you and your family are doing good. The purpose of writing this letter is to thank you for the wonderful experience that we all had at your place and to acknowledge that I had received all the photographs of those nostalgic moments.

After returning to my hometown, I got busy with daily routine work at home and pending work items at the workplace due to which I was not able to connect with you. Starting my every day during this trip by viewing the garden full of beautiful flowers in front of your home was adorable. I believe none of us can forget the quality time that our families spent together.
I request you to plan a trip to my city next month on the occasion of the festival Diwali so that our families can have a get-together.
